extendedInfo.description: The year is 2842.Organized crime is now in the hands of four gangs who control the large cities from their underground bases.You are the main Enforcer of one of these powerful gangs.Your gangâs territory operations are being badly disrupted by the other gangs.We cannot allow this situation to continue and you must take action now!______________________________________Future Shooter is a futuristic arcade side-scrolling shoot-em-up.Select your gang character and blast your way through campaigns!Game features -â Easy pickup and play game-systemâ Large campaignsâ Epic Boss battles!â Battle through level enemies, sentry guns, mines and Bossesâ Random enemies, weapons and sentry gun, mine placement (no campaign is exactly the same)â Powerful weapons including the deadly Plasma gun and the shocking Electro gun!â Up to 13 enemies on screen at once!â Choose from four gangs - Punk, Ninja, Cyborg, Soldierâ 16 player character animations and 16 gang charactersâ Three difficulty settings â Obtain new weapons through the campaignsâ Three weapon categories - melee / throw, small, largeâ Pumping electronic music!â High quality SFXâ XPERIA PLAY Optimizedâ Full game - NO in-app purchases!â Full SD support (install to SD)______________________________________IMPORTANT - Minimum device screen resolution 800x480 REQUIRED.Version 1.7 for Android versions 2.2 and above.Regularly updated.Tablets supported.Xperia PLAY Optimized.Full SD support (install to SD).Please send any feedback or problems to -Email : dancingcatdev@gmail.comâ This is a game re-launch.  If you have bought the previous version and also bought this version then please send me a email to dancingcatdev@gmail.com â______________________________________Xperia PLAY controls -Directional buttons / left touch-pad : MovementTriangle button : Melee / Grenades Cross button : Small gun Square button : Large gun Circle button : Pause / resume______________________________________Keywords - combat, action, weapons, guns, shooter, future, blasting, mayhem, scifi, sci-fi

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t download nor work. Here\'s the error \"Future Shooter\' could not be downloaded  due to an error \'error 1-947\'
reviews.author: ronald deasy

reviews.title: Better then expected
reviews.comment: Judging from screenshots i didn\'t think much about the game but it\'s really a good game for the price. Buying different weapons is great. Second game i own from developer and i like both. I will be looking at all future titles
reviews.author: A Google User
